LICENSES & CERTIFICATION.Name: Web Design for Web Developers: Build Beautiful Websites
HTML, CSS, and Javascript for Web Developers by Johns Hopkins University

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: The current system in the office is a manual system which includes paper document and very difficulty to manage.This system is  fully Automated when Student will go to next year Software will check Registration number with year and course after checking all the stuff Trigger will fire and generate room for particular student.

The purpose of this project is to automate the Department of Computer Science work. The
current system in the office is a manual system which includes paper document. In such a
system it’s very difficult to keep track of all the records. Our project aims at creating an
application which will automate the processes in the department office.
 Used HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery and Bootstrap for Front-end and PHP and MySQL for
back-end.
 Role : Login page design for Administrator,Database design and Displaying Internal and External Marks.
